generated_body: The article titled "National Cappuccino Day 2019: Deals from Starbucks, Dunkin' Donuts and More" is likely to provide information about the annual celebration of National Cappuccino Day, highlighting various promotional offers from popular coffee chains such as Starbucks and Dunkin' Donuts. Readers may expect to find details about special discounts, limited-time menu items, and events tied to the day, as well as insights into the significance of cappuccinos in coffee culture. The piece could also explore how these promotions engage customers and encourage coffee consumption on this specific occasion.
